00018 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00019 File Description:
00020 -----------------
00021   This file provides an interface to a simple queue abstraction.
00022 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00023 #ifndef _queue_h
00024 #define _queue_h
00025 
00026 
00027 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00028 Type: queue_ADT
00029 ---------------
00030   This line defines the abstract queue type as a pointer to
00031   its concrete counterpart.  Clients have no access to the
00032   underlying representation.
00033 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00034 typedef struct queue_CDT *queue_ADT;
00035 
00036 
00037 
00038 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00039 Function: new_queue()
00040 
00041 Input : na
00042 Output: na
00043 Return: pointer to ADT.
00044 Description: This function allocates and returns an empty queue.
00045 Usage: queue = new_queue();
00046 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00047 extern queue_ADT new_queue(void);
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00052 Function: free_queue()
00053 
00054 Input : pointer to ADT.
00055 Output: na
00056 Return: na
00057 Description: This function frees the storage associated with queue but not any
00058 pointer contained w/in.
00059 Usage: free_queue(queue);
00060 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00061 extern void free_queue(queue_ADT queue);
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00066 Function: enqueue()
00067 
00068 Input : pointer to ADT and pointer to object
00069 Output: na
00070 Return: na
00071 Description: This function adds obj to the end of the queue.
00072 Usage: enqueue(queue, obj);
00073 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00074 extern void enqueue(queue_ADT queue, void *obj);
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00079 Function: dequeue()  
00080 
00081 Input : pointer to ADT
00082 Output: na 
00083 Return: void * to element
00084 Description: This function removes the data value at the head of the queue
00085 and returns it to the client.  dequeueing an empty queue is an error
00086 Usage: obj = dequeue(queue);
00087 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00088 extern void *dequeue(queue_ADT queue);
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 /**********************************queue.h*************************************
00093 Function: len_queue()
00094 
00095 Input : pointer to ADT
00096 Output: na
00097 Return: integer number of elements
00098 Description: This function returns the number of elements in the queue.
00099 Usage: n = len_queue(queue);
00100 **********************************queue.h*************************************/
00101 extern int len_queue(queue_ADT queue);
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105 #endif
